meanings.sent1: The symptoms were so clear that the condition was easily diagnoseable.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that the illness was diagnoseable after running some tests.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat found the missing toy in a diagnoseable manner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as diagnoseable as a neon sign in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's frustration was diagnoseable by the way she tapped her foot.

meanings.sent1: The new technology made previously undetectable diseases diagnoseable.
meanings.sent2: The rare condition was finally diagnoseable with the advanced equipment.
meanings.sent3: The detective's keen eye made even the trickiest clues diagnoseable.
meanings.sent4: His guilt was as diagnoseable as a red stain on a white shirt.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room was diagnoseable by the loud chatter and laughter.
